blog.name: thelreads
blog.title: The L Reads
blog.description: Just a reader trying to get in the world of Manga. Currently reading My Hero Academia.

summary: Another day, another chapter of My hero academia ready to be read guys. And oh my, we’re just one day away from the first...
body:
Another day, another chapter of My hero academia ready to be read guys. And oh my, we’re just one day away from the first anniversary of the blog, and apparently we’ll be dealing with the whole Midoriya x Lucas affair, and the two kids that apparently are close to the level of the one that was supposed to be the true heir.

Oh yeah, things are slowly heating up, and it’s just a matter of time until the temperature reach uncomfortable levels for everyone involved into the situation. So let’s get to it ASAP, this is Chapter 123: Invincible.

Alright, and we kick off with the The three big-shots. Blackhair AnnoyedFace, Tintin and :> face. Going by the tittle of the chapter I’m can already imagine that those kids must be fucking badasses, to be considered the three candidates to the ranks of Top Heroes, at age of 16-17. Damn, I can’t even imagine what powers they have. Except you Tintin, your power I already have a pretty good idea what is.

The kids are amazed that the hottest clique at school decided to teach them the ropes of the business. And yeah Kaminari, but you don’t need to go commenting on the guys looks like that, they came here to teach, not to be ogled like that.

And it seems like the Deku brain finally is done processing his fast database of heroes and found out a match for the big guys over there. Alright kid, where did you saw him before, surprise me.

blog.name: thatawkwardotaku
blog.title: That one fangirl.
blog.description: Hi my name is Mailla and Aoyama Yūga is my son.

summary:
And that's when I knew why his name is Can't Stop Twinkling. Because his twinkles will never stop shining. Never. 
He's a hero...
body:
I still never got over this episode…

He was shining so brightly

And that’s when I knew why his name is Can’t Stop Twinkling. Because his twinkles will never stop shining. Never.

He’s a hero who never gives up. A hero who is willing to sacrifice himself for others. A hero who will smile through the pain. A hero who actually helps others. A hero who is brave enough to save others even if his life is in danger…Thats a true hero right there.

We sleep on beds…not Aoyama.

summary: So I’m writing an AU for my hero academia where Deku has no quirk (I.e. no all for one) and it requires a lot of rework for his...
body:
So I’m writing an AU for my hero academia where Deku has no quirk (I.e. no all for one) and it requires a lot of rework for his character, so I decided to make him a new hero outfit. He doesn’t have the same all encompassing love of allmight in this one and has more respect for heroes with subtler quirks. He studies aikido, jiu jitsu, and kendo, so I figured having stuff around the waist and leaving most places flexible makes the most sense. But I also thought it’d be pretty reckless to not have any reinforcements so I put it over bone so it wouldn’t impede movement I considered having armour on the body but I think that would be counter productive because I imagine this Deku using his flexibility a lot fighting kind of like Spike from cowboy bebop. So that’s important. I think Aizawa will be a bigger deal for him than all might in my AU.

Also Aizawa is pretty different personality wise, everyone else I can keep basically the same, but I have to change Aizawa to make the class work. And obviously Deku is basically an entirely different person. But oh well can’t be helped.

Anyway on top of just some place for info on my WIP i also figured I’d add, my first chapter is basically the news announcement on hero courses allowing quirkless students. So if anyone wants to contribute by asking some questions to the judge, the lawyers for both sides or principal Nezu I would love to add it in. (With crédit of course.) also since this is a bit big and like actually kind of feels like a real project even if it’s just a fanfic I think it might be good to get a beta reader? I’m actually super new to all of everything with fan fiction, so like I don’t know how that works at all really but if your interested that’d be great. I’ve only really just started the actual writing. But I’ve thought the idea for a long time, since I realized that wasn’t the actual canon so most of it is thought out it’s just actually writing it.

I figure it’s already been done I’ve only read fanfics for mob psycho so like I haven’t looked but I would be shocked if it hasn’t been done. But I also really want to write this with my perspective as a disabled person since I’m essentially treating being quirkless as a disability and I don’t want to accidentally steal peoples ideas so it’s easier to just stay away if that makes sense. Btw I will be writing with the idea that people know thé My hero academia universe but I dont think it should be limited to fans. So if you don’t follow the show / manga but want to be involved feel free.

summary:
Kaminari, running: Quick, Kirishima, we need to get out of here. Bakugou is on his way.
Kirishima: Why should we run? I’m not...
body:
Kaminari, running: Quick, Kirishima, we need to get out of here. Bakugou is on his way.

Kirishima: Why should we run? I’m not scared of Bakugou.

Kaminari: Bakugou is hangry.

Kirishima: [Starts running]

body:
Yoooo

I’m rewatching my hero academia and made it to episode 13. When Shigaraki is talking to his master (all for one) there are about two other voices on the screen. Idk if I’m miss hearing that or if it was a mistake by the dubbing team but this may be some bad guys for later. Or people who eventually free all for one or stain.

summary: Red splatters and orange dancing shoes
title: Red splatters and orange dancing shoes
description:
by hagura

Bakugo and Kirishima are constantly meeting in their dreams as one of the signs of them being soulmates. But they can’t spend their days seraching for one another, as both of them have their dreams they want to achieve.

blog.name: mha-noir
blog.title: Writings beneath a pale moon
blog.description: Hi, I'm Moon, and welcome to my MHA writing blog! Here you can find my writing, my vigilante ocs and ask me about them or about quirks (theories, concept help, analysis, etc.)

summary: Hi! Can I get a quirk analysis? Quirk: Flare 🌟✨⚡️💫🌠 -allows user to manipulate light and make it into any solid object they want...
question: Hi! Can I get a quirk analysis? Quirk: Flare 🌟✨⚡️💫🌠 -allows user to manipulate light and make it into any solid object they want -user can control the intensity, temperature and color of light -allows user to manipulate/emit light 	-user can create a ball of light or can create an aura of light around their whole body/parts of their body -Drawback: without light, the user’s creation are significantly weaker/more brittle and in more serious situations (such as total Blackness) (1/2)
answer:
if the user has not stored light, they may not be able to create/emit; light can cause vision impairment and extreme heat can cause burns User can control the color and temperature of creations however both are subject to change with intense emotions -sources of light include: -sunlight -moonlight -street lamps Pretty much anything that emits Light (2/2) I also just have some misc. Info about the quirk if you’re interested but I won’t send it with these

Hi!

First off, I love the amount of detail you were able to provide for your quirk, It was really helpful in figuring everything out. The first thing your oc’s quirk made me think of was glow in the dark stickers. So, I looked into what makes glow in the dark stickers glow, and found that they contain phosphors, which absorb the energy from light and emit a glow as a result.

Based on this, it would seem that your oc can produce various phosphors from their body, hence the different colors and temperatures. These phosphors can then be controlled via energy fields produced by the oc’s body which target the energy absorbed by the phosphors, then compressing the phosphors into a solid mass, ball of light, or whatever else the user might need. As for light emitted from the user’s body, that would simply be bioluminescence, with the necessary chemicals residing within the skin. This light can also be used to fuel the phosphors, however the light would not be nearly as strong as light from other sources, such as the sun, the moon, lamps, etc. I also suspect that significant fear/anxiety renders both the phosphor emission and bioluminescence inert.

title: date night for the non-cowards
description:
by physically_fight_me

Katsuki might have been possessed by some slick man from the ’80s, for he dragged Deku by the collar, and kissed him. A huge fucking smooch on the lips that felt like heaven and honey in his throat. Or maybe that was a tongue. Either way, it was awesome.

blog.name: mew-cake
blog.title: Heaven or Hell
blog.description: Hello! My name is Cake. College student and Professional Magical Girl. I hope you find something you like here! Thank you for checking out my blog <3

summary: Hi I really love making personifications of powers that are vaguely hinted at having their own consciousness. Here’s One for...
caption:
Hi I really love making personifications of powers that are vaguely hinted at having their own consciousness.

Here’s One for All! A power passed down from generation to generation in hopes of creating a better world! I’ve had this idea swimming around for a couple of months now, and there are a few more doodles I have I wanna clean up some time, but here’s the basic idea!
